item.title: Use census API in R and Python
item.author: sunsp.gis@gmail.com (Shipeng Sun)
item.description: Access Census data in Python Since Census publicized its data access API to developers, many Python pacakges had been developed to take advantage of that. Currently, there is a very long list of Python packages that allow use to access census data via scripts. census (work best with package us) censusdis (census discovery) cenpy census-data-downloader (for ACS data) pygris (for tiger boundary files) Access Census data in R There are also many packages in R that facilitate census data accsess.
